posts.title: Testing the messaging option
posts.content: This is so cool, but I got to test the messaging option to see if we could make it show up like a status message! It's awesome, right? I hope this properly show up!.

posts.title: Testing the dates
posts.content: Just adding another message to see if it properly sorts the posts from newest to oldest.

posts.title: Oh shit Easter
posts.content: Dude I got so high last night I forgot it was easter too lmao

posts.title: I love chill weeks.
posts.content: I wake up, smoke a bowl, eat myself into a food coma while gaming, I wake up again. Best way to pass the time honestly
